column12: Easy syntax but god awful installation and no proper documentation. I could not even make this run and gave up. Screw the idiots who made it and didn't maintain it.
Overly complicated syntax, camelCase names, bad AI suggestions.
Old syntax. Badly maintained documentation. There's a GUI designer for it: Qt Designer (a bit like Dreamweaver for HTML).
Easy syntax, installation and docs. Built with Flutter, very similar widget tree. Navigation between pages requires knowledge of routing.
Overcomplicated widget tree, ridiculous imports, over stylised UI. Used in industry (second most popular after Tkinter)
Easy syntax. Easily deployable via GitHub Codespaces (great for portfolios). Weird event handling and bad AI suggestions.
AI makes mistakes. Easy syntax but odd errors.
